LOGGING_COG_CHANNEL_ID.description: The Discord Channel ID of a Discord Channel where you want error messages sent to.

ALLOW_DUEL_SELF_REGISTER.description: Boolean value indicating if self registration for duels is enabled.

TLE_MODERATOR.description: The name of the role that can run moderator commands of the bot.

FIREBASE_ADMIN_JSON.description: Contents of Firebase Admin File. Encode it using https://www.base64encode.org/
